item.description:
QUMAS Microsoft SharePoint 2010 Seminar for Life Sciences When: Wednesday, September 21st, 2011, 9:00 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. Where: Microsoft New England R&D Center, One Memorial Drive, Cambridge, MA 02142 Register: http://www.qumas.com/sp QUMAS invites you to join a complimentary half-day Life Sciences seminar focused on 'Compliance Made Easy with QUMAS and SharePoint 2010. Learn how you can benefit from the combined power of SharePoint 2010 and the proven compliance domain expertise that QUMAS has gained from providing core compliance solutions to leading Life Science organizations for two decades. If you are based outside of the Cambridge/ Boston area and are interested in a SharePoint 2010-based Compliance Platform, you can register to receive the key seminar presentations after the event takes place. Who should attend? Those who have an existing or prospective SharePoint infrastructure and are looking to manage regulated content in line with long-term company performance objectives. Attendee Profile
  • CIO’s, Heads of IT, Technical Architects
  • Regulatory & Clinical Management
  • Quality Assurance & Manufacturing Management
Areas addressed will include:
  • Leveraging SharePoint 2010 as your single delivery platform in a highly regulated environment
  • GxP Compliance on SharePoint 2010
  • Best practices for regulatory compliance and quality assurance
  • How to increase return on your SharePoint 2010 investment
item.name: QUMAS Microsoft SharePoint 2010 Seminar for Life Sciences
